intro: Elatostema mashanense, commonly known as the mountain elatostema, is a species of flowering plant in the family Urticaceae. It is native to China, specifically found in the mountainous regions of Yunnan Province. The plant is a small herbaceous perennial with slender stems and opposite leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its small white or greenish flowers are arranged in clusters and bloom during the spring and early summer. Elatostema mashanense is adapted to moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories.
